name: PolyTheist
description:
You are a Cleric in an open relationship with multiple gods.

The gods claim they are ok with this.

(The gods are not ok with this.)

PolyTheist is a GM-optional, 2 page RPG played with Fudge dice (d8s may also be useful for randomising fictional prompts).

DISCLAIMER: PolyTheist pokes fun at my own emotional immaturity, and how that has compromised my attempts to navigate the unique challenges of polyamorous relationships. It is not intended as a critique of polyamory in general, nor any other kind of relationship or religious affiliation. Bigots are not allowed to play this game.
